010package imagingbook.pub.regions;
011
012import ij.gui.Overlay;
013import ij.gui.Roi;
014import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
015
016import java.awt.BasicStroke;
017import java.awt.Color;
018import java.awt.Shape;
019import java.util.List;
020
021
022/**
023 * @version 2020/04/01
024 */
025public class ContourOverlay extends Overlay {
026
027        static float defaultStrokeWidth = 1.0f; //0.2f;
028        static Color defaultOuterColor = Color.red;
029        static Color defaultInnerColor = Color.green;
030        
031//      static int capsstyle = BasicStroke.CAP_ROUND;
032//      static int joinstyle = BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND;
033//      static float[] outerDashing = {12, 4}; 
034//      static float[] innerDashing = {12, 4}; 
035//      static boolean DRAW_CONTOURS = true;
036        
037        public ContourOverlay(ContourTracer tracer) {
038                this(tracer, defaultStrokeWidth, defaultOuterColor, defaultInnerColor);
039        }
040        
041        public ContourOverlay(ContourTracer tracer, 
042                        double strokeWidth, Color outerColor, Color innerColor) {
043                
044                List<Contour> outerContours = tracer.getOuterContours();
045                List<Contour> innerContours = tracer.getInnerContours();
046                addContours(outerContours, outerColor, strokeWidth);
047                addContours(innerContours, innerColor, strokeWidth);
048        }
049        
050        public void addContours(List<Contour> contours, Color color, double strokeWidth) {
051                BasicStroke stroke = new BasicStroke((float)strokeWidth);
052                for (Contour c : contours) {
053                        Shape s = c.getPolygonPath();
054                        Roi roi = new ShapeRoi(s);
055                        roi.setStrokeColor(color);
056                        roi.setStroke(stroke);
057                        add(roi);
058                }
059        }
060
061}
062
063
